name: Obsidian Beast - Nymph
text:
2 Level 3 Flip Monsters
You can detach 2 Xyz materials from this card; add up to 2 "Obsidian Beast" monsters from your GY to your hand, and if you do, this card gains 400 ATK for each card added by this effect. If this card destroys a monster by battle: You can Special Summon 1 Flip monster from your hand or GY in face-down Defense Position.
